price: 14. (Waxaa lagu odhan) Akhri Kitaabkaaga, adigaa isugu filan maanta xisaabiye ahaan.
arabic: ٱقۡرَأۡ كِتَٰبَكَ كَفَىٰ بِنَفۡسِكَ ٱلۡيَوۡمَ عَلَيۡكَ حَسِيبٗا

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: iq'ra kitābaka kafā binafsika al-yawma ʿalayka ḥasīban
